Time Inc. Sports Illustrated Publishing and Business Records

General Files includes Keith Morris's correspondence and offices files containing memoranda and correspondence arranging collaboration events between professional sports teams or figures and product or company promotions; memoranda and correspondence arranging events honoring professional athletes; correspondence with sports teams and product companies regarding product endorsements; photographs of events; and correspondence to media organizations offering copies of celebrity athlete interviews conducted by SI.

Issue publicity includes a schedule for publicity events listing people and organizations, but not the type of event (meeting, phone call, appearance); and telegrams to radio stations, sportscasters, and others informing them of articles of interest in the current SI issue.

Radio and Television Correspondence includes offers for a free weekly mailing of the SI radio tape service to media stations and related correspondence. The tapes contained interviews with sports personalities and editorial commentary.
